## SSXEnsConfig interface

ENS options supported by SSX.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SSXEnsConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [resolve](./ssx-core.ssxensconfig.resolve.md) |  | [SSXEnsResolveOptions](./ssx-core.ssxensresolveoptions.md) | ENS resolution options. True means resolve all. |
